items.sentence: Tom has been sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole.
Tom invested all his money in the company that Mary and her father managed.
Tom\'s grandfather and Mary\'s grandfather fought together in World War II.
Tom\'s jokes are hilarious and get even better after he\'s had a few beers.
Tom and Mary got married just three months after they first met each other.
Tom and Mary were discussing the pros and cons of raising the minimum wage.
Tom and Mary were paddling a canoe down the river the last time I saw them.
Tom and Mary were sitting across from each other at a table on the veranda.
Tom always insists that he\'s right even when we all know that he\'s wrong.
Tom suffered from a heart attack and almost died waiting for the ambulance.
